about:
AWS Cloud Engineer with 3 years of hands-on experience in architecting and automating cloud-native solutions on AWS using services like EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, and VPC. Proficient in Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation), CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab, ArgoCD), and monitoring (CloudWatch, Grafana, New Relic). AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate. Passionate about building scalable, secure, and cost-efficient cloud infrastructure.

Currently working at OLA, I specialize in designing high-availability applications, automating deployments, and optimizing cloud operations. I thrive in fast-paced environments and am dedicated to staying updated with the latest cloud technologies.

projects.title: Scalable AWS Infrastructure
description: Designed and deployed scalable, secure AWS cloud infrastructure for high-availability applications.
Managed auto-scaling configurations to optimize performance and cost.
Monitored system health using Grafana, New Relic, and PagerDuty for real-time alerting.
Implemented custom IAM policies and security groups for compliance.
Used Terraform and CloudFormation for consistent infrastructure provisioning.
Automated tasks with Bash scripts to reduce manual intervention.
Authored detailed incident and RCA reports for outage prevention.

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline Implementation
description: Designed highly available infrastructure using EC2, S3, and VPC.
Automated provisioning with Terraform and CloudFormation.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and AWS CodePipeline, reducing deployment time by 50%.
Configured IAM roles and security groups, conducting regular audits.
Optimized resources with CloudWatch, achieving 20% cost reduction.
Provided 24/7 support, ensuring 99.9% uptime.

projects.title: Cloud Migration
description: Assisted in migrating on-premises applications to AWS for improved performance.
Developed automation scripts using AWS Lambda.
Configured and managed EC2, RDS, and S3 resources.
Collaborated with teams to implement business-aligned cloud solutions.

projects.title: Cloud Resource Management
description: Configured AWS services and infrastructure components.
Monitored resources with CloudWatch, maintaining performance and security logs.
Performed initial troubleshooting and escalated complex issues.
Assisted in automating tasks with AWS Lambda and scripts.
